item.title: Hurricane Erin live updates: NC under state of emergency, Northeast beaches close
item.description: Hurricane Erin has triggered a state of emergency in North Carolina, where residents and visitors along the Outer Banks are under evacuation orders.

item.title: An unidentified flying object has crashed and exploded in Poland's east

item.title: WATCH: Fireball streaks through skies over Japan
item.description: A fireball was caught on multiple cameras lighting up the night skies in southern Japan on Tuesday evening.
